title: FS: Fred Parent T206 SGC 30 SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Fred Parent T206 SGC 30 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends.  I would like to part with this Fred Parent SGC 30 Sweet Cap. 350 Fact. 25 card.  Nicer than technical grade if not for a residue spot on back. $SOLD shipped.  PP payment owed, check or MO.  I still have a T206 Cicotte SGC 40 as well, as shown in another thread  :).  Thanks for looking!

Thank you very much, Joe!

Best,
Andy

Hey Andy - I will take it!

Just let me know where to PayPal the money.

Thanks!
Joe
